message.content:
<<<api>>>: Java Advanced Imaging Image I/O Tools
<<<code>>>: 
try {
    // read a .bmp image
    File inputFile = new File("input.bmp");
    BufferedImage inputImage = ImageIO.read(inputFile);

    // create a JPEG2000 writer
    Iterator<ImageWriter> writers = ImageIO.getImageWritersByFormatName("JPEG2000");
    ImageWriter writer = writers.next();

    // set output file
    File outputFile = new File("output.jp2");
    ImageOutputStream ios = ImageIO.createImageOutputStream(outputFile);
    writer.setOutput(ios);

    // write the image
    writer.write(inputImage);
    ios.close();
} catch (IOException e) {
    e.printStackTrace();
}
<<<explanation>>>: This code reads a .bmp image using ImageIO.read(), then it gets a JPEG2000 writer using ImageIO.getImageWritersByFormatName("JPEG2000"). It sets the output file and writes the image to the output file in JPEG2000 format.
